# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Distribution / packaging
.Python
build/
develop-eggs/
dist/
downloads/
eggs/
.eggs/
lib/
lib64/
parts/
sdist/
var/
wheels/
*.egg-info/
.installed.cfg
*.egg

# Temp files
temp_*/
*.tmp
*.temp

# Output files (if not using temp directory)
output/

# Environment files
.env
.venv/
env/
venv/

# IDEs
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo

# OS generated files
